name: makeRelative

schema.description: absolute path of a file or folder without a slash at the end

simplifiedSchema.description: absolute path of a file or folder without a slash at the end

schema.description: folder path without a slash at the end

simplifiedSchema.description: folder path without a slash at the end

description:
Makes a path relative using proper parsing

Resulting path will apply the paths conventions
- no slash at the end
- no slash at the beginning
